languages.text: "Священная земля. Священное место. Священные предки. Этот слуга богов и родичи его приносят дары и возносят молитвы правителям былого, дабы процветало племя под огненными крылами Бога-орла".
"Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."
languages.original_text: "Священная земля. Священное место. Священные предки. Этот слуга богов и родичи его приносят дары и возносят молитвы правителям былого, дабы процветало племя под огненными крылами Бога-орла".

traits.locale_text: "Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of yore, so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

"Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of yore, so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

"Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of yore so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

"Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of yore so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."
"Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."
"Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

languages.text: “这里是我们的圣地，神圣的祖先安息之所。此仆人与他的亲族会为远古的君王献上礼物，向他们祈祷。这样一来，部落便会在鹰神的火翼庇护之下日益繁荣。”
languages.original_text: "Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

traits.locale_text: “这里是我们的圣地，神圣的祖先安息之所。此仆人与他的亲族会为远古的君王献上礼物，向他们祈祷。这样一来，部落便会在鹰神的火翼庇护之下日益繁荣。”

languages.text: "Geweihter Boden. Sakrale Stätte. Heilige Ahnen. Dieser Diener der Götter und seine Brüder bringen den Herrschern von einst Geschenke und beten zu ihnen, auf dass der Stamm unter den Flammenschwingen des Adler-Gottes florieren möge."
languages.original_text: "Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

traits.locale_text: "Geweihter Boden. Sakrale Stätte. Heilige Ahnen. Dieser Diener der Götter und seine Brüder bringen den Herrschen von einst Geschenke und beten zu ihnen, auf dass der Stamm unter den Flammenschwingen des Adler-Gottes florieren möge."

languages.text: «Camposanto. Lugar sagrado. Antepasados benditos. Este siervo de los dioses y su pueblo trajeron regalos y ofrecieron plegarias a los soberanos de antaño para que la tribu prosperase al amparo de las alas de fuego del Dios Águila».
languages.original_text: "Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

traits.locale_text: «Camposanto. Lugar sagrado. Antepasados benditos. Este siervo de los dioses y su pueblo trajeron regalos y ofrecieron plegarias a los soberanos de antaño para que la tribu prosperase al amparo de las alas de fuego del Dios Águila».

languages.text: « Terre sainte. Lieu sacré. Ancêtres bénis. Ce serviteur des dieux et ses semblables apportent offrandes et prières aux souverains d'antan pour que la tribu prospère sous les ailes de feu de l'Aigle-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

traits.locale_text: « Terre sainte. Lieu sacré. Ancêtres bénis. Ce serviteur des dieux et ses semblables apportent offrandes et prières aux souverains d'autrefois pour que la tribu prospère sous les ailes de feu de l'Aigle-Dieu. »

languages.text: 「尊い場所。神聖な場所。聖なる父祖。この神々の下僕とその一族は、鷲神の炎の翼のもとで一族が繁栄するよう、貢物を携えて、いにしえの統治者に祈りを捧げる」
languages.original_text: "Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

traits.locale_text: 「尊い場所。神聖な場所。聖なる父祖。この神々の下僕とその一族は、鷲神の炎の翼のもとで一族が繁栄するよう、貢物を携えて、いにしえの統治者に祈りを捧げる」

languages.text: "Takdis edilmiş topraklar, kutsal bölge, mukaddes atalar... Tanrıların bu hizmetkârı ve soydaşları, geçmişin hükümdarlarına hediyeler getirip dualarını sunarlar ki kabileleri Kartal Tanrı'nın ateşten kanatları altında refaha erişebilsin."
languages.original_text: "Hallowed ground. Sacred place. Holy ancestors. This servant of the gods and his kin bring gifts and offer prayers to rulers of old so that the tribe may prosper under the Eagle-God's wings of fire."

traits.locale_text: "Takdis edilmiş topraklar, kutsal bölge, mukaddes atalar... Tanrıların bu hizmetkârı ve soydaşları, geçmişin hükümdarlarına hediyeler getirip dualarını sunarlar ki kabileleri Kartal Tanrı'nın ateşten kanatları altında refaha erişebilsin."
